pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Analysis, No Gibbs // Provides functions for the Bayesian analysis of some simple commonly-used models, without using Markov Chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) methods such as Gibbs sampling. The 'rust' package https://cran.r-project.org/package=rust is used to simulate a random sample from the required posterior distribution. At the moment three conjugate hierarchical models are available: beta- binomial, gamma-Poisson and a 1-way analysis of variance (ANOVA).
